description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $49.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Universal Sheet Metal. The average
  contract duration was 0.51 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $308.3K. The longest
  contract was 1.24 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $857.0K.
